statements: SELECT * FROM insurance_information
SELECT patient_name, coverage_amount FROM insurance_information
SELECT insurance_company, claim_status FROM insurance_information WHERE policy_number = 123
SELECT * FROM insurance_information WHERE date_of_service BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT patient_name, coverage_amount, date_of_service FROM insurance_information ORDER BY date_of_service DESC
SELECT * FROM insurance_information WHERE coverage_amount > 5000 ORDER BY date_of_service DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT policy_number, insurance_company, claim_status FROM insurance_information WHERE coverage_amount <= 3000
SELECT DISTINCT insurance_company FROM insurance_information ORDER BY insurance_company ASC
SELECT patient_name, insurance_company, date_of_service FROM insurance_information WHERE claim_status = 'approved' AND date_of_service BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT policy_number, patient_name, insurance_company FROM insurance_information WHERE insurance_company LIKE '%health%'
SELECT * FROM insurance_info;
SELECT policy_holder_name, insurance_company FROM insurance_info ORDER BY insurance_company ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_billing WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_start_date FROM insurance_info WHERE policy_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT service_code, service_description FROM medical_billing ORDER BY service_code DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_info WHERE policy_number = 12345;
SELECT policy_holder_name, insurance_company FROM insurance_info WHERE policy_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_number, policy_holder_name, insurance_company FROM insurance_info WHERE policy_end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT policy_number, insurance_company FROM insurance_info WHERE insurance_company LIKE 'AIG%';
SELECT billing_id, patient_id, service_code, amount FROM medical_billing WHERE amount > 1000.00 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicy;
SELECT policy_holder_name, premium_amount FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE policy_type='Health';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM PatientInformation ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT bill_id, service_description, billed_amount FROM MedicalServiceBilling WHERE billed_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicy JOIN PatientInformation ON InsurancePolicy.policy_id = PatientInformation.patient_id;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_type, premium_amount FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE policy_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND policy_end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM PatientInformation WHERE patient_age > 30 AND patient_address LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT bill_id, service_description, billed_amount FROM MedicalServiceBilling WHERE billed_amount > 1000 ORDER BY service_date DESC;

SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicy JOIN PatientInformation ON InsurancePolicy.policy_holder_name = PatientInformation.patient_name WHERE InsurancePolicy.policy_type = 'Health' AND PatientInformation.patient_age BETWEEN 18 AND 60;
SELECT patient_phone_number, bill_id, service_description FROM PatientInformation LEFT JOIN MedicalServiceBilling ON PatientInformation.patient_id = MedicalServiceBilling.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Insurance_Companies;
SELECT company_name, company_location FROM Insurance_Companies WHERE company_location = 'New York';
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM Services ORDER BY service_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, amount, billing_date FROM Patients INNER JOIN Billing ON Patients.patient_id = Billing.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Insurance_Companies ORDER BY company_name DESC, company_location ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender='Male' OR patient_gender='Female' ORDER BY patient_dob DESC;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM Services WHERE LENGTH(service_description) > 50 ORDER BY service_name;
SELECT patient_name, amount, billing_date FROM Patients JOIN Billing ON Patients.patient_id = Billing.patient_id WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY billing_date ASC;

SELECT company_id, company_name, company_location FROM Insurance_Companies JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT(patient_id) FROM Billing) AS Billed_Patients ON Insurance_Companies.company_id = Billed_Patients.patient_id ORDER BY company_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, premium_amount FROM insurance_policies WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialization, phone_number FROM medical_providers WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT service_name, cost FROM medical_services WHERE cost < 500 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies WHERE premium_amount > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, address FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT provider_name, specialization, phone_number FROM medical_providers WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT service_name, cost FROM medical_services WHERE cost BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY cost DESC;

SELECT patient_name, service_name, amount_due FROM patients p JOIN billing_records br ON p.patient_id = br.patient_id JOIN medical_services ms ON br.service_id = ms.service_id WHERE br.status = 'Unpaid';
